questions: Are there people standing in the image?
Are there people sitting in the image?
Does the image present a comparison logic: people standing are more than people sitting?
model_output:
yes There are individuals standing in the background and middle ground of the image.
yes There are individuals sitting in the foreground of the image.
yes The number of people standing appears to be greater than those sitting, as the standing figures occupy a larger area of the image.
